item.title: Making Player Control Teleports Help? ^_^
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

if your making it for the emote tabs the put ur mouse over the emote tab u wana change and find the id in the top right corner… it will #### like 4 numbers or so… then fine the thing in ur client.java that says something on the controls… and then make it so it uses that line…

sendquest(“blah blah blah”, ####);

should look like that and for the teles put

sendquest(“blah blah blah”, ####);
triggerteleX = 3319;
triggerteleY = 3234;

should look similar to that

item.title: Making Player Control Teleports Help? ^_^
item.dc:creator: @_Paranoia †Paranoia†
item.description:
@_Paranoia wrote:

Like, I’m trying to make this [CODE] } if (command.startsWith(“train3”)) {
teleportToX = 3319;
teleportToY = 3234;
sendMessage(“Train3!”);

	        }[/code] into a player controls teleport, but I don't know how.

Help please?

NOTE: I just started my server, & I don’t know anything. So help is uber appreciated.

Read full topic
